mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_acct = #{userAcct}, user_password = #{userPassword}, user_name = #{userName}, user_picture_url = #{userPictureUrl}, sex = #{sex}, tel = #{tel}, mail = #{mail}, idcard = #{idcard}, role = #{role}, version = version + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where is_delete = 0 and version = #{version} and user_code = #{userCode}
update t_sys_user set is_delete = 1, version = version + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.select: select user_code userCode, user_acct userAcct, user_password userPassword, user_name userName, user_picture_url userPictureUrl, sex, tel, mail, idcard, role, version from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0 and user_code = #{userCode}

select user_code userCode, user_acct userAcct, user_password userPassword, user_name userName, user_picture_url userPictureUrl, sex, tel, mail, idcard, role, version from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0
and user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and role = #{role}
order by user_code
